tool_description: An API for generating anagrams of words.
name: anagrams of a word API
title: anagrams of a word API

api_list.name: /anagrams
api_list.description: Our API is easy to use, simply make a GET request to the endpoint '/anagrams' with a word as a query parameter and get a JSON response containing the word and the list of anagrams. It can be integrated with any application that needs anagrams of words

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word to get the anagrams for
